meanings.definition: A large amount or quantity of something
meanings.sent1: She had wodges of books on her shelf.
meanings.sent2: The store received wodges of new inventory for the sale.
meanings.sent3: Carrying wodges of groceries made her arms ache.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in wodges of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with wodges of gold coins.

meanings.definition: To stack or pile in a haphazard manner
meanings.sent1: He wodges the boxes in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: Please don't wodges the papers on my desk.
meanings.sent3: She wodges the pillows on the couch for a cozy look.
meanings.sent4: The kids wodges their toys in a messy pile.
meanings.sent5: The chef wodges the ingredients together for the recipe.
